wordageddon.model

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordageddon.model.GameEngine

  • public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Core game engine that manages the Wordageddon game logic and state. This class handles: - Game initialization with different difficulty levels - Question generation based on document term frequencies - Answer validation and scoring - Game state management The GameEngine works with a DocumentTermMatrix to analyze text documents and generate meaningful questions about word frequencies and distributions.
    Since:
    2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gregorio Barberio, Francesco Peluso, Davide Quaranta, Ciro Ronca

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameEngine

        public GameEngine(DocumentTermMatrix dtm,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> visibleDocuments)
        Constructs a new GameEngine with the specified document data.
        Parameters:
        dtm - the Document-Term Matrix containing processed document data
        visibleDocuments - list of document names that should be used in the game

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame(java.lang.String difficulty)
        Starts a new game session with the specified difficulty level. Initializes game state and generates the first question.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - the difficulty level ("facile", "medio", or "difficile")

      • getDocumentMatrix

        public DocumentTermMatrix getDocumentMatrix()
        Retrieves the Document-Term Matrix used by this game engine.
        Returns:
        the DocumentTermMatrix containing the analyzed document data

      • submitAnswer

        public boolean submitAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
        Submits an answer for the current question and validates its correctness. Automatically generates a new question after processing the answer.
        Parameters:
        answer - the player's answer to the current question
        Returns:
        true if the answer is correct, false otherwise

      • getCurrentQuestion

        public java.lang.String getCurrentQuestion()
        Gets the current question text.
        Returns:
        the current question being asked, or null if no question is active

      • generateFrequencyQuestion

        public java.lang.String generateFrequencyQuestion()
        Generates a frequency question for testing purposes. This method is used in the main method for demonstration.
        Returns:
        the generated frequency question text

      • generateMostFrequentWordQuestion

        public java.lang.String generateMostFrequentWordQuestion()
        Generates a most frequent word question for testing purposes. This method is used in the main method for demonstration.
        Returns:
        the generated most frequent word question text

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Main method for testing the GameEngine functionality. Demonstrates question generation using sample documents.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments (not used)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are issues reading documents or stopwords
